Biotech  
b) Agric. Economics and

c) Soil Science and Env.  
Mgt.  
d) Animal Science and      
        Fisheries

(General Agriculture)

with options at the final year 
in:  
(i)  Agric Economics.     
(ii)  Agric Extension & 
Rural  
   Sociology.        
(iii) Animal Production  
(iv) Plant  Health  
Management

 OOU           
PLASU

   UTME

IBADAN requires five (5) credit passes including 
English Language, Biology/Agricultural Science, 
Chemistry, Mathematics and any one of Geography, 
Physics or Economics   
UMUDIKE accepts Five (5) 'O’ level credit passes at not  
more than two (2) sittings to include: English Language, 
Mathematics, Chemistry, Biology, or Agricultural 
Science and any other science subjects; requires at 
least ‘O’ level pass in Physics. ‘O’ level credit in 
Agricultural Science must be backed up with at least ‘O’ 
level pass in Biology  
OOU, EKSU and ILORIN accept ‘O’ level pass in 
Physics.  
IMSU accepts a pass in Maths if a candidate has credit 
in Physics and vice versa.  
ABU requires credits in Mathematics and Physics.  
Also requires five (5) ‘O’ level credit passes to 
include English Language, Biology/Agricultural 
Science, Chemistry, Mathematics, Physics, 
Geography and Economics.   
IBADAN, EKSU, ILORIN and TASUED require ‘O’ level 
credit in Agricultural Science and a pas s in Biology.  
UDU and AAU accept ‘O’ level pass in English 
Language.  
BIU requires at least ‘O’ level pass in Physics.  
BAYERO requires five (5) O' level credit passes to 
include English Language, Biology/Agricultural 
Science, Chemistry and any one (1) of  
Mathematics/Physics, Geography.   
FED-WUKARI requires five (5) O’ level credit passes 
at not more than two sittings to include: English 
Language, Mathematics, Chemistry, Biology, or 
Agricultural Science and any of Physics, Geography 
and Economics.  
KSU requires five (5) credit passes at SSC in English 
Language, Mathematics, Chemistry, Biology or 
Agricultural Science, Economics or any other 
Science/Social science subject and a pass in Physics.
